knimeNode.name: XML Combine and Write
knimeNode.shortDescription: Writes XML cells in a file.

fullDescription.intro: The node takes the XML Documents of the selected column combines them to a single documents an writes it to the selected file.
fullDescription.option: The column containing the XML cells.
Choose if existing files should be overwritten here. If this option is unchecked, the node will fail if a file already exists.
The name of the root element in the output file.

ports.inPort: Input table containing at least one XML column.
